confirmAction(uint256).details: ReplaceSigner requires 2-of-3, all other actions require 3-of-3

params.evidenceLink: URL to source of truth for resolution (can be empty for degen markets)
params.heatLevel: The heat level for market volatility
params.imageUrl: URL to market image/thumbnail (IPFS or HTTP, can be empty)
params.question: The prediction question
params.resolutionRules: Clear rules for how to resolve

createMarketAndBuy(string,string,string,.details: This guarantees the creator is the first buyer - impossible to front-run      msg.value must cover both marketCreationFee + minBet

dispute(uint256).details: Requires 2x the proposal bond. Triggers voting period.

params.marketId: The market with the proposal to dispute

emergencyRefund(uint256).details: Available 24h after expiry if: no proposal, or voting resulted in tie

executeAction(uint256).details: ReplaceSigner requires 2-of-3, all other actions require 3-of-3

finalizeMarket(uint256).details: Can be called by anyone. Distributes bonds to winners.

getMaxSellableShares(uint256,uint256,boo.details: Uses binary search to find max shares where grossBnbOut <= poolBalance

params.isYes: Whether selling YES or NO shares
params.userShares: The user's total shares on this side

returns.bnbOut: Net BNB the user would receive after fees
returns.maxShares: Maximum shares that can be sold without exceeding pool balance

returns.surplus: Amount that can be swept to treasury
returns.totalLocked: Total funds locked in markets and bonds

proposeOutcome(uint256,bool).details: Requires bond payment. Creator has priority in first 10 minutes.

params.marketId: The market to propose outcome for
params.outcome: The proposed outcome (true = YES wins, false = NO wins)

vote(uint256,bool).details: Vote weight equals total shares owned. Free to vote.

params.outcome: The outcome to vote for (true = YES, false = NO)

withdrawBond().details: Pull Pattern - users must call this to receive their funds

withdrawCreatorFees().details: Pull Pattern - creators must call this to receive their fees

CREATOR_PRIORITY_WINDOW().notice: Creator priority window - only creator can propose (10 minutes)

DISPUTE_WINDOW().notice: Dispute window - time to dispute a proposal (30 minutes)

EMERGENCY_REFUND_DELAY().notice: Emergency refund delay after expiry (24 hours)

MIN_HEAT_LEVEL().notice: Heat level bounds for governance (1 to 200 base units * 1e18)

UNIT_PRICE().notice: Fixed unit price for shares (P_YES + P_NO always equals this)

VOTING_WINDOW().notice: Voting window - time for voting after dispute (1 hour)

canEmergencyRefund(uint256).notice: Check if a market is eligible for emergency refund

claim(uint256).notice: Claim winnings from a resolved market

createMarketAndBuy(string,string,string,.notice: Create a new prediction market AND place the first bet atomically

finalizeMarket(uint256).notice: Finalize a market after voting ends or dispute window passes

getDispute(uint256).notice: Get dispute details for a market

getMarketStatus(uint256).notice: Get the current status of a market

getMaxSellableShares(uint256,uint256,boo.notice: Calculate maximum shares sellable given current pool liquidity

getNoPrice(uint256).notice: Get current NO price based on bonding curve

getPendingCreatorFees(address).notice: Get pending creator fees for an address

getPendingWithdrawal(address).notice: Get pending withdrawal balance for an address

getPosition(uint256,address).notice: Get a user's position in a market

getProposal(uint256).notice: Get proposal details for a market

getRequiredBond(uint256).notice: Calculate the required bond for proposing an outcome

getRequiredDisputeBond(uint256).notice: Calculate the required dispute bond (2x proposal bond)

getSweepableAmount().notice: View function to check sweepable surplus

getVoterCount(uint256).notice: Get number of voters for a market

getYesPrice(uint256).notice: Get current YES price based on bonding curve

pendingCreatorFees(address).notice: Pending creator fees from trades (Pull Pattern)

pendingWithdrawals(address).notice: Pending withdrawals for bonds and jury fees (Pull Pattern)

previewBuy(uint256,uint256,bool).notice: Preview how many shares you'd get for a given BNB amount

previewSell(uint256,uint256,bool).notice: Preview how much BNB you'd get for selling shares

proposeAction(uint8,bytes).notice: Propose a governance action (any signer can propose)

proposeOutcome(uint256,bool).notice: Propose an outcome for an expired market

totalPendingCreatorFees().notice: Total pending creator fees across all users (v3.4.1 - for sweep protection)

totalPendingWithdrawals().notice: Total pending withdrawals across all users (v3.4.1 - for sweep protection)

vote(uint256,bool).notice: Cast a vote on a disputed market

withdrawBond().notice: Withdraw pending bonds, jury fees, and other credits
